title: How is Plutus IAS for answer writing practice? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: Plutus IAS is at present India’s top IAS coaching institute. It provides online as well as offline classes and has a team of highly experienced and trained faculty, who have cracked the exams, worked and now are sharing their knowledge with the students. Mains answer writing is one of the most crucial part of IAS examination. The aspirants need to practise lots of answers before actually writing in the examination hall. Plutus IAS has started an answer writing program, where the mentors check the answers written by the students and provide them with the valuable feedback. One can check the answers written by the students of Plutus IAS Upsc Answer Writing Practice - Plutus IAS.
